title: Play on words: the provision of ESL in schools
creator_credit: Open Channel Productions, John Moore and Carole Sklan
brief_description: The ESL child will learn faster if language is purposeful and whole in the sense that it conveys meaning. And if able speakers of English join in these activities, then the ESL learner’s progress is likely to be even faster.
